89cc62f8-316c-45cf-8b3b-89d66820b5c7:
A cloud of golden particles covers everyone and everything in the area, causing creatures to become blinded and visibly outlining invisible things for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. All within the area are covered by the dust, which cannot be removed and continues to sparkle until it fades. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} at the end of their turn, blinded creatures may attempt new Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} to end the blindness effect.
Any creature covered by the dust takes a –40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g}.
ba231311-0708-481e-85e8-ffd9339be682: A favored blessing of halfling clerics, this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants its target a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects. If the target fails a saving throw against fear, it {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rerolls{/g} the save with a +4 morale bonus and takes the new result, even if it is worse. After that the spell's effect ends.
97fbb64a-bbd8-45ca-900f-447fdd5be594: A favored blessing of halfling clerics, this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants its target a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects. If the target fails a saving throw against fear, it {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rerolls{/g} the save with a +4 morale bonus and takes the new result, even if it is worse. After that the spell's effect ends. If the target has the fearless racial {g|Encyclopedia:Trait}trait{/g}, it is immune to fear instead.
295f8940-2c6c-439f-818d-8b1ff7dc6d40:
A rain of dirt, gravel, and small pebbles fills the area, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} to every creature in the area. This {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} only occurs once, when the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is cast.
For the remaining duration of the spell, this debris covers the ground, making the entire area difficult terrain.
e94c85f0-901f-4897-a15d-7fe32c177aa3: A {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}chaotic-aligned{/g} weapon can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} of certain creatures.
82ee8cee-c251-471d-8295-88efeab4e256: A {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} weapon can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} of certain creatures.
395871b1-b29e-42cb-b4d5-23fd0640d263: A {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}lawful-aligned{/g} weapon can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} of certain creatures.
ed08f544-58bc-4c7b-981d-7a8a1c53f5e6: Aid grants the target a +1 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against fear effects, plus temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (to a maximum of 1d8+10 temporary hit points at caster level 10th).
1210055d-e0ea-4e13-84c0-cc9cc20d5c4f: Align weapon makes your currently equipped weapon chaotic, evil, good, or lawful, as you choose. A weapon that is aligned can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} of certain creatures.
84b67713-cdbb-4a0d-8b4a-179a2b0cbc3b:
All allies within 30 feet gain a +2 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +2 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. Both these bonuses apply against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by chaotic creatures.
Additionally, the abjuration protects from attempts to dominate or charm the subject.
e29cc3c9-42b2-436d-bf76-4835f07f5566:
All allies within 30 feet gain a +2 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +2 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. Both these bonuses apply against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by creatures with corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignments{/g}.
Additionally, the abjuration protects from attempts to dominate or charm the subject.
92b50816-6ea8-479d-b534-0ab9aa8c0220:
All allies within 30 feet gain a +2 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +2 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. Both these bonuses apply against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by evil creatures.
Additionally, the abjuration protects from attempts to dominate or charm the subject.
23ca4c4f-5ff8-4169-8327-275277039e12:
All allies within 30 feet gain a +2 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +2 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. Both these bonuses apply against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by good creatures.
Additionally, the abjuration protects from attempts to dominate or charm the subject.
b142ef4f-3963-40ad-96ec-857003c2d79a:
All allies within 30 feet gain a +2 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +2 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. Both these bonuses apply against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by lawful creatures.
Additionally, the abjuration protects from attempts to dominate or charm the subject.
e8a87b4a-e0f7-4aa1-9e8c-93640da9d9ec:
All targeted living creatures of less than 6 {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit dice{/g} become frightened. If a creature succeeds at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}, it is instead shaken for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Creatures with 6 or more HD are immune to this effect.[LONGSTART]
Scare dispels remove fear.[LONGEND]
83733c1b-9fc4-4ddb-9eaa-90300e0a5095: An arrow of acid springs from your hand and speeds to its target. You must succeed on a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit your target. The arrow deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} with no splash {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. For every three {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} you possess, the acid, unless neutralized, lasts for another {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} (to a maximum of 6 additional rounds at 18th level), dealing another 2d4 points of damage in each round.
d4e56c62-3cf4-4db1-89f6-89c6d239ff0d: An {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil-aligned{/g} weapon can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} of certain creatures.
223eab56-16d8-4c02-9136-6b6beef13397: Armor you wear no longer reduces your {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. You also reduce the armor's armor {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} by 1 + 1 per five {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 5).
a1560d91-35c7-4c2b-9fe5-dd2697e34241:
Barkskin toughens a creature's skin. The effect grants a +2 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to the creature's existing natural armor bonus. This enhancement bonus increases by 1 for every three {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} above 3rd, to a maximum of +5 at 12th level.
The enhancement bonus provided by barkskin stacks with the target's natural armor bonus, but not with other enhancement bonuses to natural armor. A creature without natural armor has an effective natural armor bonus of +0.
2dcf2b51-4482-4862-8bd2-1a5487fed3b6: Each time the creature successfully strikes an opponent with a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g}, each consecutive hit against the same opponent deals extra {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to the number of previous consecutive hits you have made against that opponent this turn. This damage is multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}.
ed2d37ff-64bd-4505-8b22-32ea4887c0a7: The affected creature gains greater vitality and stamina. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants the subject a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, which adds the usual benefits to {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, Fortitude {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, Constitution {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, and so forth.[LONGSTART] Hit points gained by a temporary increase in Constitution score are not temporary hit points. They go away when the subject's Constitution drops back to normal. They are not lost first as temporary hit points are.[LONGEND]
ade0e312-fe72-49dc-98c1-8432cce50a86: The character takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}.
b63ae3f1-05f7-4be3-b5eb-dc9ab9e0ce63: The subject becomes stronger. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, adding the usual benefits to {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and other uses of the Strength modifier.[LONGSTART] Enhancement bonuses do not stack with other enhancement bonuses, for example with bonuses from belts.[LONGEND]
55dfbf54-db7d-46ab-9270-2f2eb2d248b3: The subject becomes temporarily immune to poison. Any poison in its system or any poison to which it is exposed during the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration does not affect the subject until the spell's duration has expired. Delay poison does not {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} that poison may have already done.
2068da3d-b478-4316-8749-b712622c4b44: The target becomes smarter. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, adding the usual benefits to Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} and other uses of the Intelligence modifier.[LONGSTART] Wizards (and other spellcasters who rely on Intelligence) affected by this spell do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Intelligence, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DCs for spells they cast while under this spell's effect do increase. This spell doesn't grant extra skill ranks.[LONGEND]
a15db669-22c7-4947-9109-890b35dde149: The target loses the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}, but is {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +10).
2ee5091f-5f67-4534-bdd2-b00719553a73: The transmuted creature becomes more graceful, agile, and coordinated. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, adding the usual benefits to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and other uses of the Dexterity modifier.
396a43b9-61c7-4164-9937-03e1c87577b8: The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}, adding the usual benefits to Charisma-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} and other uses of the Charisma modifier.[LONGSTART] Bards, paladins, and sorcerers (and other spellcasters who rely on Charisma) affected by this spell do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Charisma, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DCs for spells they cast while under this spell's effect do increase.[LONGEND]
964c812c-3d81-40e5-a248-1e7d36bc6995: The transmuted creature becomes wiser. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, adding the usual benefit to Wisdom-related {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.[LONGSTART] Clerics, druids, and rangers (and other Wisdom-based spellcasters) who receive owl's wisdom do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Wisdom, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DCs for their spells increase.[LONGEND]
1ea97bdf-c7f8-4518-9e62-26a529824f49: This creature has a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects. If it has the fearless racial {g|Encyclopedia:Trait}trait{/g}, it is immune to fear instead. If the target fails a saving throw against fear, it {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rerolls{/g} the save with a +4 morale bonus and takes the new result, even if it is worse. After that the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s effect ends.
6cb255aa-c19e-47e2-a783-d4ecdcd86764: This creature is cowering in fear.
47b3bf1f-185c-4f88-9964-2dea1b846810: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} afflicts the subject with uncontrollable laughter. It collapses into gales of manic laughter, falling prone. The subject can take no {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g} while laughing, but is not considered {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}. After the spell ends, it can act normally. On the creature's next turn, it may attempt a new Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} to end the effect.[LONGSTART] A creature with an {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} score of 2 or lower is not affected.[LONGEND]
f9114e33-b3e3-472e-8b86-b60b850cb8db:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} causes an arc of flame to leap from your fingers, burning one enemy nearby plus one additional enemy per 3 caster levels, each of which must be within 15 feet of the primary target.
It deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 10d6) to the primary target. For every additional target, reduce the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dice by half (rounded down).
Each target can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} for half damage.
99c58d16-b733-45e9-a8d2-90f64a8342ef:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} creates a number of illusory doubles of you that inhabit your square. These doubles make it difficult for enemies to precisely locate and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} you.
When mirror image is cast, {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} images plus one image per three {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum eight images total) are created.[LONGSTART] These images remain in your space and move with you, mimicking your movements, sounds, and {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g} exactly.[LONGEND] Whenever you are attacked or are the target of a spell that requires an attack roll, there is a possibility that the attack targets one of your images instead.[LONGSTART] If the attack is a hit, roll randomly to see whether the selected target is real or a figment. If it is a figment, the figment is destroyed. If the attack misses by 5 or less, one of your figments is destroyed by the near miss. Area spells affect you normally and do not destroy any of your figments. Spells and effects that do not require an attack roll affect you normally and do not destroy any of your figments. Spells that require a {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} are harmlessly discharged if used to destroy a figment.
An attacker must be able to see the figments to be fooled. If you are invisible or the attacker is blind, the spell has no effect (although the normal miss chances still apply).[LONGEND]
c232e91c-c618-4c9e-995a-14473a3f34a2:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions as entangle, except the plants are coated with an irritating sap that creates a painful, itching rash on creatures that {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} them. Any creature that enters the area must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} or be sickened as long as it remains in the area and for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} afterward. Creatures that remain in the area must save each round. This is a poison effect.
Entangle: This spell causes tall grass, weeds, and other plants to wrap around creatures in the area of effect or those that enter the area. Creatures that fail their save gain the entangled condition. Creatures that make their save can move as normal, but those that remain in the area must save again each round. Creatures that move into the area must save immediately.
Entangled creatures can break free by making a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics check{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this spell every round.
The entire area of effect is considered difficult terrain while the effect lasts.
dd7a797c-7086-4987-a09b-4524d43bd36e: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} makes your eyes shine blood red and allows you to see the vital areas and weak points of creatures as a warm glow. This allows you to make sneak {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, as the rogue ability of the same name, dealing an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}; this additional damage increases by 1d6 for every 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} you possess beyond 3rd, to a maximum of +5d6 at 15th level. This additional damage stacks with other sources of precision damage.
2dac9f4f-0c71-422a-9d5b-95345ffa6b57: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a small air elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
267b187b-957e-4e39-8187-c9aca5dbcaf3: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a small earth elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
dbddcc09-40bb-484b-963a-f3db285c5c91: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a small fire elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
5253fb67-9a2d-4bf5-a8d3-c1a30792ff01: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a small fire, water, air, or earth elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
383deee1-2bcd-4550-9ab3-a51196017498: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a small water elemental. The summoned elemental appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
a23d125f-7c14-4448-8436-30ca089fdab9: Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, your movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
be937064-2b6a-4d26-8f5e-ffccb6f3992f:
Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them. The strands are similar to spiderwebs but far larger and tougher. Creatures caught within a web become grappled by the sticky fibers.
Anyone in the effect's area when the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is cast must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g}. If this save succeeds, the creature is inside the web but is otherwise unaffected. If the save fails, the creature gains the grappled condition, but can break free by making a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics check{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this spell. The entire area of the web is considered difficult terrain. Anyone moving through the webs must make a Reflex save each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Creatures that fail lose their movement and become grappled in the first square of webbing that they enter.
b4494078-cdb8-4922-b7ea-fa5bd0248743:
When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +10).
Since undead are powered by negative energy, this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} cures such a creature of a like amount of damage, rather than harming it.
373e25c4-1810-4eb5-9247-d60f7c3fb036: When you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} you strengthen your paladin's aura of courage. Until the end of its duration, all allies within that aura are immune to fear (magical or otherwise). If you do not have the aura of courage class feature, aura of greater courage has no effect.
3e88d006-4795-481f-bea6-519394a45b39: With this prayer you provide long-lasting succor to a wounded creature. For as long as the effect lasts, the target receives a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear and death effects. At any time while the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is in effect, the target can choose to end the spell as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} for a burst of {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} energy. The target loses the saving throw bonus, but is healed of {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +10).
49de1cf1-1c97-4894-96c7-5f5329c804e1: With this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} you can bestow your divine grace on another good creature for a short amount of time, infusing that creature with a portion of your holy virtue. When you {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} the subject, you grant that creature a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) on all saving throws.
208e7987-c5fb-40fe-bdb8-0fd4e458de61: You blast an area with a tremendous cacophony. Every creature in the area takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} and must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} to avoid being stunned for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
f57bab25-a084-4cc8-83c4-1068166e3822: You blast your enemies with a searing beam of fire. You may fire one ray, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 3rd (to a maximum of three rays at 11th level). Each ray requires a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
d90b63e7-035a-4ed7-a882-c675d93ce636: You call upon the powers of unlife to render the subject blinded.
a25c8bfb-ad4e-4f86-b047-61606309f4c7: You can see any objects or beings that are invisible within your range of vision.
0a7c4cdc-d8ee-4520-b15d-7f578a99c430: You compel the target to beg for forgiveness. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}, the target cowers in fear. On a successful will save, it is shaken for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Each round after, a cowering subject may attempt a new save to end the effect.
f2eb74c1-e8a2-4daa-ad83-a8758c3a950e: You create a fist-sized, red-hot ball of molten metal that you immediately hurl as a splash weapon. A direct hit deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. Every creature within 5 feet of where the ball hits takes 1d6 points of fire {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the splash (Reflex half). Each of these creatures takes an additional 1d6 points of fire damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for the next 1d3 rounds.
708d1fcc-ee64-4444-a3d8-ccf2b326e95c:
You create an extradimensional hole with a depth of 10 feet per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 30 feet). Since the pit extends into another dimension, the pit has no weight and does not otherwise displace the original underlying material. You can create the pit in the deck of a ship as easily as in a dungeon floor or the ground of a forest.
Any large or smaller creature standing in the area where you first conjured the pit must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to jump to safety in the nearest open space. In addition, the edges of the pit are sloped, and any creature ending its turn on a square adjacent to the pit must make a Reflex saving throw with a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to avoid falling into it. Creatures subjected to an effect intended to push them into the pit (such as bull rush) do not get a saving throw to avoid falling in if they are affected by the pushing effect.
Creatures who fall into the pit take falling {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as normal ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per 10 feet). To climb the pit's coarse stone walls, a creature needs a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of 25. When the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} ends, creatures within the hole rise up with the bottom of the pit until they are standing on the surface over the course of a single {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
26aa562c-cbd7-4bc9-9e4d-27d383d6195e: You fade into the background, and while you are not truly invisible, you are hard to pinpoint due to your translucent state. While under the effects of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g} and have {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} from creatures more than 5 feet away ({g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} have a 20% miss chance).
c41bb561-bfad-406a-92b3-fb535403a368: You fill your target's mind with a blaring cacophony of discordant sounds, making it hard for the target to act and {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentrate{/g}. The creature gains the nauseated condition for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} if it fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}.
8e311b01-6eff-4788-8525-2de845ccd274: You gain intuitive insight into the workings of traps. You gain an insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +10) on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} made to find traps while the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is in effect.
b764bcbb-e17b-422a-80db-6118b995ee89:
You gain some of the beneficial qualities of an animal. Your base form is largely unchanged and your {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} is unaltered, but some of your body parts are altered. Armor or gear you are wearing adjusts to your new shape for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. When you cast animal aspect, choose one of the following animals to gain the associated benefits. You can only have one animal aspect or greater animal aspect spell active on you at a time.
Gorilla: Your arms become long, flexible, and strong like those of a great ape. You gain a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g}.
Monkey: Your hands and arms become dexterous like those of a simian. You gain a +4 competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics checks{/g}, and you can throw objects as if you had the Throw Anything {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Raccoon: Your hands become extremely dexterous, and your feet become padded. You gain a +2 competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g}.
Raptor: Your legs become built for running {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}, like those of a deinonychus. You gain a enhancement bonus of +20 feet to your base speed.
f7cb2cbc-b34a-4703-96e0-d11a4dfa8196: You harness the power of unlife to grant yourself a limited ability to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}. While this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is in effect, you gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} + 1 per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +10).
d7486745-d397-42cd-9533-bfe610f0c772: You inflict a painful, itching rash on the target creature. The target is sickened and takes a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} (this penalty cannot lower Dexterity below 0).
cd7cbee9-c66a-44e6-9485-380b7fc7b2f8: You take control of a target living creature's skeleton. A creature has its skeleton rattle within its flesh, causing it grievous harm. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, plus 1d6 additional points of damage per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
e0ff4a37-f03f-4aa1-aa1c-cc232616346c: You weaken the target's defenses against poison. The target gains a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against poison. Attempts to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} the poisoned target take a –4 penalty.
df03ef94-ca45-4a20-96dd-d23c1c3ad770: You weaken the target's defenses against poison. The target gains a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against poison. Attempts to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} the poisoned target with {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} or magic take a –4 penalty.
e0b70443-90cc-4710-a3fa-687c230a4558: Your gestures and droning incantation fascinate nearby living creatures, causing them to stop and stare blankly at you in a dazed condition. {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}Roll{/g} 2d4 to see how many total HD of creatures you affect.
21cb0c60-c383-434f-85ba-4fe860a026e0: Your litany conjures chains of energy that lash upward from the ground and hamper the target's movement. The target is entangled.
5992ed29-7422-4cea-b65f-aeac5fcca9d0: Your litany is a fascinating diatribe of grace, causing your target to do nothing but listen. The target is fascinated. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to the target automatically breaks the effect.
f44736db-6210-42dd-99ed-420956d75dd9: Your melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} and causes the target to be staggered for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, the target is staggered for 1 minute instead.
b73c8d23-1102-49d7-ba68-47f834018ab4:
[LONGSTART]This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like hold person, except that it affects an animal instead of a humanoid.
[LONGEND]The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place. It is aware and breathes normally but cannot take any {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, even speech.[LONGSTART] Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} on its turn, the subject may attempt a new Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} to end the effect.[LONGEND]
